page.pageName: DDoS for Web - Applications Product Page

metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare offers free DDoS protection for websites and applications with all application services plans. Sign up now to protect against DDoS attacks.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DDoS Web Protection
relatedBlades.subtitle: Powerful, always-on DDoS protection for web applications and websites.
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare provides automatic, intelligent DDoS mitigation from the edge of our global network — mitigating most attacks in three seconds.

columnContent.title: No-cost mitigation
columnContent.description: Get unlimited, unmetered DDoS mitigation, with no penalty for spikes due to attack traffic.

columnContent.title: Unmatched network resiliency
columnContent.description: Avoid attack-related outages with intelligent, always-on protection — powered by millions of Internet properties across our global network.

columnContent.title: One-click onboarding
columnContent.description: Onboard your web applications within minutes — and add security, performance, and reliability capabilities with the click of a button.

relatedBlades.title: Mitigate layer 7 DDoS attacks at scale
relatedBlades.copy:
Our industry-leading DDoS protection spans %{DataCenterCount}+ data centers on our global network, so [threats are automatically blocked](https://developers.cloudflare.com/ddos-protection/about/how-ddos-protection-works/) as close to end users as possible — without passing through centralized scrubbing centers first.

Advanced machine learning models continuously improve our defenses, so we can stay ahead of emerging attacks on your behalf.

relatedBlades.title: Improve your security program using the latest DDoS trends for 2023

buttonOne.elementName: DDoS for Web - ADDITIONAL OFFER BLADE - CTA

relatedBlades.title: 2023 Gartner Peer Insights "Voice of the Customer": DDoS Mitigation Solutions
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare is named a Customers' Choice in the Gartner® Peer Insights™ "Voice of the Customer": DDoS Mitigation Solutions

imageAssetFile.altText: Gartner Peer Insights Customers' Choice 2023 award
imageAssetFile.title: Gartner 2023

contentfulAsset.description: Gartner Peer Insights Customers' Choice 2023 award

content.value: "It's been really impressive to see how Cloudflare's DDoS mitigation continues to evolve and morph, and it's definitely the best DDoS mitigation we've ever had. It's easy. It's a no-brainer."

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare DDoS Protection absorbs and mitigates attacks within seconds, analyzes incoming threats, and helps ensure business continuity

columnContent.title: Mitigate attacks in three seconds
columnContent.description: Our network automatically identifies and blocks most DDoS attacks in three seconds — no backhauling required.

columnContent.title: Minimize outage-driven revenue loss
columnContent.description: Attack traffic is mitigated close to the source, helping ensure a seamless end-user experience and reducing negative business impact due to latency and outages.

columnContent.title: Monitor traffic patterns and incoming threats
columnContent.description: Cloudflare's built-in analytics give you deeper insights into your traffic patterns, threats observed (and blocked), and much more — right from the Cloudflare Dashboard and GraphQL API.

relatedBlades.htmlContent: Explore more use cases

relatedBlades.description: Trusted by millions of Internet properties

primaryCtaButton.elementName: DDoS for Web - CASE STUDIES - (Lead gen) - CTA

planFeatures.name: Web Application Firewall (WAF)
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Web Application Firewall's intuitive dashboard enables users to build powerful rules through easy clicks and also provides Terraform integration. Every request to the WAF is inspected against the rule engine and the threat intelligence curated from protecting millions of websites. Suspicious requests can be blocked, challenged or logged as per the needs of the user while legitimate requests are routed to the destination, agnostic of whether it lives on-premise or in the cloud.

planFeatures.name: Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)
planFeatures.description: Mirage automatically optimizes image loading through virtualized and lazyloaded images. It detects the browser type of a visitor and optimizes performance for the particular device, improving the performance of images on a mobile connection.

features.title: How Cloudflare DDoS Protection works
features.description: Cloudflare's autonomous, centralized DDoS systems analyze traffic samples out of path, which allows Cloudflare to detect and mitigate attacks without causing latency or impacting performance.

features.title: Defend against evolving DDoS attacks
features.description: The HTTP/2 'Rapid Reset' vulnerability represents a major shift in the DDoS landscape. Here are five steps to get ahead of it.
